note:
Cared for my wife from 2017-23. After a dramatic deterioration, J lives in professional care. Alzheimer's is an awful disease for all concerned.üò≠

On his deathbed, dad said his dad & grandmother were Aboriginal, calling his grandparents a combo - an illegal mixed couple. Who knew? Not me. True? No idea. Yet. I toot as a white man, & benefit from the privilege that brings in Australia. I live on Darug land.
